title: Talking the Talk with Justin Brierley
description:
I have the pleasure of speaking with the host of the @Unbelievable?  podcast Justin Brierly. We delve into the topic of why have discussions from opposing sides in the first place. It was such a lovely chat and I so appreciate Justin giving me a moment of his time

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Talking-the-Talk-with-Justin-Brierley-e14nfo4
Check out Justin's book here: https://t.co/2cbYFWIb8O?amp=1

Check our Unbelievable here: https://t.co/3ahB16Enqf?amp=1

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
